isuues.value: Education & Literacy,Health & Family Welfare,Sports,Women's Development & Empowerment

isuues.value: PUNJAB->Jalandhar, Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar , Amritsar

detailsOfAchievement: The organisation is running a football academy which provides free boarding and lodging,coaching,education sports kits to 4000 underprivileged kids.A state of the art youth development complex with hostel,seminar room,mess,computer lab,health club has been constructed.The org. runs computer education centers,physiotherapy centers for underprivileged youth .Primary education project imparts education to 2167 children in 20 Govt Primary schools through football based programs.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: Department of Social Security and Child Development
sourceOfFunds.purpose: Youth Football Club Rurka Kalan aims to deliver a programme in partnership with funders and partners to support youth and adolescents who are already involved in drugs and who might be exposed to highly rampant drug abuse problem in Punjab.The objective of the programme are as follow: a.T create awareness and educating the youth about the ill effects of alocoholism and substance abuse. b.To build a value based system in the lives of youth using football.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: Department of Social Security and Child Development
sourceOfFunds.purpose: The project are football training program to promote gender equality,improve health,increase employ ability, instill self children through female youth coaches who will be trained to conduct development activities for these young children.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: Department of social security and child development
sourceOfFunds.purpose: The proposed project YFC aims to provide employable skills at Village level.The is huge demand of workforce with good communication skills and computer literacy. The one year course designed by YFC will equip the youth with computer skills and develop excellent communication skills in them.Our further linkages with industry and service sector companies will help to arrange employment opportunities for them.YFC is qualified for the task as it has been running computer education course since 2006.

detailsOfAchievement: OUR NGO Youth Voice Foundation SERVED LANGAR SEWA for the Covid-19 patients and needy patients at Civil Hospital, Jalandhar and Civil Hospital, Phagwara. We have served LANGAR SEWA to around 15 thousand needy patients and Covid-19 patient and migrant workers. Given essentials at Delhi borders for the farmers. Helped poor family girls for their weddings. Given oxygen concentrator for Covid-19 patients. Helped many handicapped people. helped orphanages children

sourceOfFunds.purpose: 1.TO WORK FOR WELFARE OF GENERAL PUBLIC AND WEAKER SECTION OF SOCIETY 2.TO GRANT SCHOLARSHIP TO POOR AND DESERVING STUDENTS. 3.TO MAKE ARRANGEMENT OF LANGAR FOR NEEDY AND POOR PEOPLE. 4.TO FIGHHT AGAINST SOCIAL EVILS LIKE DOWRY AND DRUGS. 5.TO SOLICIT OBTAIN AND ACCEPT DONATIONS, GIFTS FROM PERSON OR FIRM OR INSTITUTION. 6. TO BUILD OLD AGE HOMES . 7. TO BUILD SCHOOLS AND COLLAGES FOR WEAKER SECTION OF SOCIETY. 8. TO HELP DAUGHTERS OF WEAKER SECTION OF SOCIETY IN THEIR MARRIEGE.
